Memes are love <3

  • 18 Feb 2018
  • By Niyanta
  • social

What sorcery are these memes anyway? If you try to lookup their meaning on Google, it goes as an image, video, piece of text, etc., typically humorous in nature, that is copied and spread rapidly by Internet users, often with slight variations.
That doesn't sound like something that's a big deal. So what's with all the craziness about them!
Let me give you a description.
Memes are emotions. Memes connect. Memes are ice breakers. Memes are a proof that people miles away from you connect as equally with you as your neighbour. Memes are fun.
Memes are love <3 There are so many categories in memes, one for every emotion. This tempts me to make one;


Sharing is caring <3
I am absolutely crazy about memes. Be it any situation, I can define it with a meme. If there's a new meme in the market, I must have it. I must share it, make my people enjoy it. It's an addiction :3

Stay tuned for more!

Cheers,
Niyanta
